"Crawford": "Thanks again for volunteering to search for Bruder and his team. Everyone will be cheering you on."
"However, like I said, Nex Aerio is a fearsomely strong opponent. It will be a race against time, so I'd like you to plan and prepare with utmost caution."
"On my end, I've called upon the aid of some veteran ARKS here in the city."
"If it feels like you might not be prepared enough, I'd like you to seek guidance from them."
"Whatever happens, you must come back alive. Understood?"
